column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Strategize
#Text=A strategy is a well-designed plan of attack for a personal or professional goal .
#Text=The success of a strategy depends upon how realistic it is , how detailed it is and how organized the action steps are .
#Text=Create your strategic planning team , organize five to 10 action steps and set up review deadlines to strategize effectively .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Choosing an Issue to Address
#Text=Start with an issue you want to address .
#Text=This is your starting point .
#Text=Strategize one issue at a time .
#Text=If you have several issues that need to be addressed , you will need several strategies .
#Text=Strategy is a custom process , not a one-size-fits-all solution .
#Text=Pick a goal or desired outcome .
#Text=Choose the scope of what you want to achieve .
#Text=You have created your ending point , and the strategy will fill out all your actions from start to end .
#Text=Decide whether the goal is feasible .
#Text=Perhaps you want to ask others with more experience if they think it can be done .
#Text=For example , if you want to get a promotion in one year , ask a colleague in a higher position how long it took them to get into a management role .
#Text=If the goal is not a feasible one , try to go for a more feasible solution , such as getting a 5 percent raise or more responsibility .
#Text=Later , strategize how to get a promotion in two or five years .
#Text=Making a Planning Team
#Text=Invite others to join your strategic planning session that have a stake in the outcome .
#Text=At work this may be all the members of management or a department .
#Text=For personal goals , this may be your partner , parents or friends .
#Text=Explain the goal to your team .
#Text=Give them a period time to think about the issues .
#Text=Specialize .
#Text=If someone is a human resources representative , they should strategize how best to ask for a raise .
#Text=If someone else is a financial planning expert , they can strategize how the raise could improve your quality of life and motivation .
#Text=Brainstorm some ideas about how to address the issue .
#Text=Write any potentially useful ideas .
#Text=Picking Your Tools
#Text=Get organized .
#Text=The most important tools are a pen and pencil while you bring up ideas .
#Text=However , other tools can help you collect information along the way and chart progress .
#Text=Decide how you will keep track of your process .
#Text=You will need to quantify your success on a weekly or monthly basis .
#Text=For example , if you want to gain 500 more Facebook followers , you should report on the number of total and new followers each month , in addition to the posts you have used .
#Text=Facebook itself has several valuable reporting tools .
#Text=Get high tech .
#Text=At the very least , you should have an Excel spreadsheet , but you may also want to sign up for a Google Analytics account , a CRM management software or a financial tracker like Mint.com.
#Text=Setting Goals and Timelines
#Text=Decide when your final deadline to achieve a strategy will be .
#Text=Break down the strategy into 5 to 10 action steps between now and the final deadline .
#Text=Date those steps to indicate when they should be put into motion .
#Text=Mark those dates in your calendar , with extra reminders for projects that will take several weeks to complete .
#Text=Break each step into sub-steps if necessary .
#Text=Organize them into bulleted points with as much information as necessary .
#Text=Delegate tasks to others if it is a team strategy .
#Text=Make them accountable to you or other people , by asking them to submit a progress report on a specific day .
#Text=Review the data every month .
#Text=Adjust your steps accordingly to account for adjustments in deadline or approach .
#Text=Share all strategy plans with people who are involved with the strategy .
#Text=Update the documents and share them whenever they change .
#Text=Consider starting a Google Drive spreadsheet or document if you do n’t have a common platform to use with other people in the strategic planning committee .
#Text=Make a date for the strategy to be complete .
#Text=Review it at that time .
#Text=If it has been successful , consider using similar strategies in the future .
#Text=If it has n’t been successful , learn from your mistakes and try new steps each time .
